properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne bodimpa janaalikin nerpimpu naaku no prabhu Nan vedkinatlu nenunu nasinchuvarin vedkedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Athmeya bojanambuto poshinchinatlu nannunu Moorchilluvarikinnade neniyyaganu nadpuma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kashtambulondu varini rakshimpa galgunatluga Nakimmu needu sakthini nan Dhairya prachumo prabhu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne nerpunatlu naakunu nee divya vakyam nerpumu Aalinchunatlanekulu naa bodanu deevimpuma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prayasamondu variki vishraanthi kalgunatlugaa O darchu shakhthi menduga nee yathmache nakimmayaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee divyamomu juchuchun nee haayi santoshambulu Ne nondudaaka nannilan nee chitta maara nadpuma{/lang-eng}
